name: Sauce Tale
description:
This is the first I've posted here and the first game I've ever made. I was mostly practicing Bitsy with this. If this gets good enough reviews, I might just make a sequel that takes place in Goob's house.

Also you have to take the sauce in order to continue. 

Hopefully, you play how I intended because you can literally end the game before even doing anything. Just talk to the cat and continue from there..
